title: Common Diabetes Drug Linked With 'Exceptional Longevity' in Women
desc: Not only can the drug metformin help to effectively manage type 2 diabetes, but it may also give older women a better chance of living to the grand old age of 90, according to research published in 2025 – thanks, it seems, to a variety of anti-aging effects.
